00060 void SeedRandom(unsigned long seed);
00061 
00062 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 unsigned int RandomUInt(void);
00066 
00067 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 float RandomUnitFloat(void);
00071 
00072 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 float RandomUnitOpenFloat(void);
00076 
00077 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 inline float RandomSymmetricFloat(void)
00081 {
00082     return (2.0f*RandomUnitFloat() - 1.0f);
00083 }
00084 
00085 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 inline float RandomIntervalFloat(float fMin, float fMax)
00089 {
00090     return fMin+(fMax-fMin)*((float)RandomUnitFloat());
00091 }
00092 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 
00094 } // end namespace: Spark
